details.title: Definition
details.description: A private cloud is a cloud used by a single entity, providing greater control but with higher costs compared to public clouds.

details.title: Control
details.description: Offers much greater control for the company and its IT department.

details.title: Costs
details.description: Comes with greater cost and fewer benefits compared to public cloud deployments.

details.title: Hosting
details.description: Can be hosted from the company's on-site datacenter or in a dedicated offsite datacenter.
